name: Rowdy Robots
description:
You and up to four friends can battle for glory in gladiatorial robot combat to see who is the Rowdiest!

This battlebot-inspired arena fighter is the product of a 4 month semester work schedule for a game development course at my university. I took the lead of 8 other students, none of whom have ever touched unreal before, and taught and helped them make this game!

CoreDev Lead: William O'Tuel (@purelysalty)

Design Lead: Larry Boyd (@NE_0_N)
